text: Ani amhi pratyeka paigambara kevala yasathi pathavila ki allahacya adesanvaye, tyacya adesace palana kele jave, ani jara he loka, jyanni svatahcya prananvara atyacara kela, tumacyajavala ale asate ani tyanni allahajavala tauba (ksama-yacana) keli asati ani paigambarannihi tyancyasathi maphi magitali asati tara nihsansaya, allaha ya lokanna motha mapha karanara, daya karanara adhalala asata
